        public it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.Int2ReferenceMap<com.io7m.jtensors.parameterized.PVectorI4F<R2SpaceRGBAType>> geometryGroupColors()
        The mapping from groups to colors. Each instance will be rendered a specific color based on the group to which it belongs. If no mapping exists from the group number to a color, the default color will be used instead.
        Specified by:
